entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Kindersley
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:59 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Light snow. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Light snow ending early this evening then clearing. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 40 in the morning and minus 31 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Temperature rising to minus 15 by morning.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 15 by morning. Wind chill minus 31 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023
